activities:
EduTone Corporation (hereinafter, “EduTone”) understands the importance of data privacy on behalf of subscribers to its services, and we provide multiple ways for people to contact us with queries and requests.

All of EduTone’s services are aimed at the education market - comprising K-20 educational institutions, teachers, students and their parents - and include the following:
1. XchangeTM Single Sign-On platform
2. The Global Grid for Learning Library content service (www.ggflondemand.com)
3. The Global Grid for Learning Marketplace
4. The WetheTeachers community portal (www.wetheteachers.com); and
5. The EdPay store front portal for schools (www.edpay.net)

Each of EduTone's services are capable of being customized to the specific educational and cultural requirements of any given territory around the world. EduTone works with local partners in each territory who understand what the local educational and cultural requirements of the territory are. These requirements include the territory's policies on data protection and the use of personally identifiable information belonging to any service subscriber. Such information will only ever be used within the territory in which the subscriber subscribes for the purposes described in our Privacy Policy, and within the limits of the territory's policies on data protection and the use of personally identifiable information.
eucountries: Austria, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, client, customer and end user data
